title: Stage Lv10-S35
description: Level 10 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: Where exactly did things start to go wrong?
How should we interpret this situation?
learning_points: Level 10 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.en: Where exactly did things start to go wrong?
How should we interpret this situation?

sentences.kr: 진짜 원인이 뭘까? 표면적인 게 아니라.
sentences.en: What's the real cause? Not the superficial one.
Why does this pattern keep repeating itself?
Could all these series of events be mere coincidence?
Was this really a predictable outcome?
How would it look from a different perspective?
